website_summaries.verdict: Choose these if polarized lenses are important to you. They offer a comfortable, attractive style with a fit that's easy to adjust.
pros: Modern style and lightweight wear with polarized lenses that are ideal for extended time in bright sun
Streamlined design from the Linea Rossa collection
cons: Not the best pick for men who prefer non-polarized lenses, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Looks like these are authentic
customer_reviews.text: Looks like these are authentic, the serial number is on the arm, not the lens as with my other Prada sunglasses. Checked that against official ones from Sunglass Hut and they're the same way. The SN was nearly completely rubbed off on my copy though, and it looks like the screw on the left arm is a little stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: These are not authentic sunglasses. Very good replicas but definitely FAKE. Took them to the store and they verified that they are knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! They are authentic, very nicely packaged, and about 1/2 the price of Sunglass Hut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. Not prone to scratching due to rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Much as expected. Nice glasses. Not prone to scratching due to rubber frames which don't slide off face when looking down, etc. A good feature....
customer_reviews.author: GREGGG

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite sunglasses ever. They fit me perfectly. This is my 2nd pair. First pair last almost 8 years of normal every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Vustadumas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap feel compared to other Prada glasses I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Prescription lens would not fit the frame
customer_reviews.text: I submitted a question to rep, and was told prescriptions lens would fit they would not. I returned the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a year and a half now. They are amazing. Very durable, lenses don't have one scratch on them and they are so clear it's amazing. You get what you pay for. Shipping was very, very fast. Only problem is that the case that these come in scratch pretty easily. It is pretty beat up and is cracking. My buddy has a pair of Prada's with the exact same type of case and his has gotten pretty beat up too. But the glasses--- AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Haddix

customer_reviews.title: The quality is fantastic and they are great for work or going out
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a gift for my husband. The quality is fantastic and they are great for work or going out. The case is really nice and protective.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this color
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this color. They are not overpowering and have a nice shine to them in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: SONIA ASGHAR

customer_reviews.title: Fancy glasses in dusty box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these glasses and they arrieved on time. fancy, fits well, confortable. nice design. only issue was it's box was dusty and had to clean everytime after I take it out from box. after speding $150 , expected good / clean box
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I got the sunglasses for my husband and he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: SARA  M LYON

customer_reviews.title: Great, good looking sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for gift for my fiancé , in which this is his second pair of Prada sunglasses & he absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: My fiancé love the for valentines day gift he put them in ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé love the for valentines day gift he put them in to even throw out the trash! Get buy and excellent delivery time ! hunkaru
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit perfectly. Very light, comfortable, and look great. This is my second pair of these. Favorite everyday sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mykeymic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shades at a great price for quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shades at a great price for quality. I hated my Oakley's the lenses where overpriced, cheaply made and scratched very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hall

customer_reviews.title: The shades!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and an even greater price!! Thank you very much!! Would highly recommend these to anyone looking for high end sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: michael l dudzik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy prada makes very high quality glasses and here its 200 hundred dollars cheaper then a retail store
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dooley

customer_reviews.title: New and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: My glasses are great, exactly as I expected. They arrived quickly in Australia.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These are authentic sunglasses, came with the Prada case and the cleaning cloth! i was worried to receive a cheap copy of Prada but in fact i have received the same pair i saw in other shops for few more $
customer_reviews.author: Abed Halabi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had these exact same glasses that I absolutely loved and someone sat on them and broke them! I was filled with Joy to find them here! Great quality, exactly what I was looking for! Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are great. Came on time and were in great shape. Couldn't be more pleased. Fit exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly more than satisfied!! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what wanted, in brand new perfect condition... Thank you, I will be back...
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months and the Prada symbol on the side has come off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit! Came with the case, cleaning cloth, and the glasses were perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. Great quality as always.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. The view is very good and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian

customer_reviews.title: Great deals
customer_reviews.text: It's great love it..will tell my friends about it..like shopping with you and will countine for a long time S
customer_reviews.author: Samanta harrichan

customer_reviews.title: top quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish are first rate and the lenses are fantastic with the progressive shading. These sun glasses are everything you'd expect from prada.
customer_reviews.author: R. Abrams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these for a long time and my wife finally bought them for me for my birthday. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Not for Asian face
customer_reviews.text: This sunglasses is probably more fit on white peoples face instead of Asian due to its curve frame design. Be a aware of it
customer_reviews.author: Love prada

product_meta.title: Prada Men's 0ps 54is Rectangular
product_meta.description: Prada eyewear collection is distinctive not only for their high quality standards, but for their forward thinking approach to style. If you’re looking for a non-conventional interpretation of fashion that embraces technology while respecting tradition, then look no further than Prada’s distinctive line of glasses.
